author: foxis86
content: Does etherscan usually take that long to index blocks on ropsten ? I have submitted transactions 4 hours ago to infura node and they are still waiting to be indexed in etherscan. Etherscan is 2069 blocks behind the block count I'm getting from infura

content: Something seems strange. I just submitted another transaction and it was just mined and showed up in block 10682374 in etherscan. But if I inquire rposten infura it shows up in block 10684459
